document_data.mainbody:
Margaster Villa was the family estate of the Waterdhavian noble house Margaster.
The villa was located in the central section of Waterdeeps North Ward within a neighborhood enclosed by Suldown Street and Vhezoar Street. Margaster Villa sat on Stabbed Sailor Alley and Shattercrock Alley within the neighborhood.
The walled compound contained four buildings arranged around a central garden. All four buildings stood two storys tall.
